summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4211 for the improvement of Renton Avenue, from Empire Way to a point 800 feet south of the south margin of Genesee Street; by constructing sewers, and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 50072, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
